item.title: Jefferies upgrades Nike, says shares can jump more than 50%
item.description: The firm said now is the right time to aggressively scoop up shares of Nike given its upside potential.

item.title: One-time market favorite Palantir drops 11% on Monday and is now down nearly 30% from high
item.description: The stock is on pace for its fourth straight losing session.

item.title: ETFs that allow investors to make big bets on market moves are gaining in popularity
item.description: Leveraged ETFs amplify the daily returns of an index or stock using financial derivatives.

item.title: Bank of America snub by Warren Buffett in his annual report raises eyebrows
item.description: The surprise came after Berkshire Hathaway slashed its holding in Bank of America.

item.title: Here are Monday's biggest analyst calls: Nvidia, Nike, Block, Twilio, Alibaba, Apple, Dell, Berkshire Hathaway, Tesla and more
item.description: Here are Monday's biggest calls on Wall Street.
